title: what is ms
body: so what is ms? i feel kinda slow from 80+ lower than that feels the same

replies.body: MS stands for milliseconds, and it's the time it takes for your network to ping our servers. Basically it's the amount of time it takes your network to send data back and forth with us in order to play the game. Unlike FPS, lower ping is better, and if you're having some lag I'd suggest giving the steps in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) a try. Make sure to do your troubleshooting in custom/practice games!
